name: 3D_Breakout
description:
A Breakout clone in 3d. Move, Rotate, and bump your paddle to hit the ball in the right direction.

(Controls are available in the menu, [upper right corner] )

Source Code on Gitgud

https://gitgud.io/lavaduder/3d-breakout

___

Godot does export to windows and mac. However mine seemed to be glitched. If you can fix it, feel free to re-upload.
